lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic moved ahead for the first time in his long-running rivalry with Rafael Nadal when the world number one thrashed the Spaniard to win the Qatar Open in Doha on Saturday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic moved ahead for the first time in his long-running rivalry with Rafael Nadal when the world number one thrashed the Spaniard to win the Qatar Open in Doha on Saturday....

headline.main: Djokovic Crushes Nadal to Start Year With Title
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Crushes Nadal to Start Year With Title
